channel.title: The American cowboy
channel.description:
Documentary series on the American cowboy, produced by the University of Texas.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Suited to his time
item.description: This program offers an introduction to the American cowboy.
item.dc:creator: Burke, Bill
item.dc:subject: West (U.S.)

item.title: Ranch and range
item.description: This program focuses on typical cowboy settlements.
item.dc:creator: Burke, Bill
item.dc:subject: West (U.S.)

item.title: The cowboy comes to town
item.description: This program focuses on the cowboy's preferred recreational activities.
item.dc:creator: Burke, Bill
item.dc:subject: West (U.S.)

item.title: Promo collection
item.description: This program consists of promotional announcements for the series.
item.dc:creator: University of Texas
item.dc:subject: West (U.S.)

item.title: Get up, guns, and gear
item.description: This program focuses on the typical accoutrements of the cowboy.
item.dc:creator: Burke, Bill
item.dc:subject: West (U.S.)

item.title: Tongue loose and fancy free
item.description: This program focuses on the role of the raconteur in cowboy culture.
item.dc:creator: Burke, Bill
item.dc:subject: West (U.S.)

item.title: Indian Sign
item.description: This program focuses on the American Indian.
item.dc:creator: University of Texas
item.dc:subject: West (U.S.)

item.title: The cowboy's likeness
item.description: This program focuses on the challenge that artists face when trying to capture the essence of the cowboy in their art.
item.dc:creator: Burke, Bill
item.dc:subject: West (U.S.)

item.title: Petticoats on the plain
item.description: This program focuses on some women's experiences in the cowboy's world.
item.dc:creator: Burke, Bill
item.dc:subject: Women

item.title: Pilots of plain and pass
item.description: This program focuses on distinct elements of cowboy culture and how they often each had their own discrete times and contexts.
item.dc:creator: Burke, Bill
item.dc:subject: West (U.S.)

item.title: Laughter, loud and lonely
item.description: This program focuses on the "jovial joys" of the cowboy.
item.dc:creator: Burke, Bill
item.dc:subject: West (U.S.)

item.title: Half horse, half human
item.description: This program focuses on the importance of the horse in the life of a cowboy.
item.dc:creator: Burke, Bill
item.dc:subject: West (U.S.)

item.title: Cowboy on the trail
item.description: This program focuses on stories of cowboys on the trail.
item.dc:creator: Burke, Bill
item.dc:subject: West (U.S.)

item.title: Fiction, fancy, and fact
item.description: This program looks at the various elements - some based in reality, others not - that created the cowboy mystique.
item.dc:creator: Burke, Bill
item.dc:subject: West (U.S.)
